original_text: When the Lord has finished all his work against Mount Zion and Jerusalem, he will say, “I will punish the king of Assyria for the willful pride of his heart and the haughty look in his eyes.
korean_text: 그러므로 주께서 주의 일을 시온 산과 예루살렘에 다 행하신 후에 앗수르 왕의 완악한 마음의 열매와 높은 눈의 자랑을 벌하시리라

sentences.original_text: When the Lord has finished all his work
sentences.korean_translation: 주께서 그의 모든 일을 마치셨을 때

sentences.original_text: I will punish the king of Assyria
for the willful pride of his heart
and the haughty look in his eyes
